additional_buffs.description: [Hero Sword] Strengthen skills: Every 5 star Valkyrie raises attack power by 5% and every 6 star Valkyrie raises attack power by 10% with [Hero Sword]. (Effective even if Valkyrie is at the Time Shop and can increase up to 100%. [Hero Sword]: Skill that increases ally unit's attack power for a certain amount of time during raid)
